titleStmt.title: Be it knowen to all Criste[n] people, that Syr Iohn Pyllet Eng[lysshe] knyght of the holy sepulcre of Criste co[m]mynge from Iherusalem, was t[aken by the] Mauris & infidels ...
titleStmt.author: Catholic Church. Pope (1513-1521 : Leo X)

notesStmt.note: Publisher and date of publication suggested by STC (2nd ed.).
Imperfect: cropped and torn, with loss of text.
Reproduction of original in the Society of Antiquaries.
